headline: Retired Special Agent
summary: Experienced Supervisory Special Agent with a demonstrated history of working in the federal law enforcement industry.  Skilled in Law Enforcement, Immigration Law and Business Visas, Intelligence Analysis, Policy Writing, and Training Development.  Strong federal sector and protective services professional with a Bachelor of Art (B.A.) focused in Forensic Studies/Political Science from Indiana University Bloomington.

positions.companyName: Immigration and Customs Enforcement Homeland Security Investigations
positions.description: Federal regulatory worksite enforcement employer compliance.  Immigration law, policy, and training.  Oversight and management of the National Employer Compliance Inspection Center and Homeland Security Investigations (HSI) national Form I-9 audit program, providing guidance and investigative assistance to all HSI offices.  Creation and oversight of national HSI worksite enforcement policies.  Development and oversight of basic and advanced worksite enforcement training for all HSI auditors and special agents.  Certified by the Federal Law Enforcement Training Center as a course developer and instructor.
positions.title: Retired Supervisory Special Agent-Section Chief

positions.companyName: Immigration and Customs Enforcement Homeland Secuirty Investigations
positions.location: Human Smuggling and Trafficking Center- Washington D.C.
positions.title: Retired Supervisory Special Agent- Acting Deputy Director

positions.companyName: Immigration and Customs Enforcement, Homeland Security Investigations
positions.description: Develop and implement basic and advanced immigration training utilizing the instructional design principles.  FLETC certified advanced instructor. Supervised a cadre of ICE instructors in basic, advanced, and international training programs.
positions.location: Federal Law Enforcement Training Center  (FLETC Glynco GA)
positions.title: Retired Supervisory Special Agent- Section Chief
